title: Sad news: The Spice and Wolf Season 3 petition was shut down.
body:
1,079 people before reaching the 20,000 man cap, after around 2 years of running, Funimation took the petition down because the account owner apparently violated EPCA for whatever reason.

So yer, truly sad news, to say the least.

"Funimation, you should be hating."
